Name: Mystic Reversal
Story Background: In the heat of battle, the clever mage knows that the best defense is a swift reversal of fortune.
Ability: Counter target spell unless its controller pays 3. If the spell is countered this way, exile it instead of putting it into its owner's graveyard.
Appearance Description: The art depicts a mage weaving mystical energies in front of a looming, darkened horizon, symbolizing the power to defy fate.
